content: Ibadehin Majeed is the creator and mastermind behind Ibaslogic. You might know him better as Ibas, a talented front-end developer, writer, and passionate advocate for project-based learning.

Ibas has made significant contributions to the dev community by sharing his wealth of knowledge on popular topics such as JavaScript, React, Gatsby, and CSS. His written content has been featured on top websites like LogRocket, earning him a reputation as a highly skilled and respected developer in his field.
